channel.title: itanium on rmoff's random ramblings2

item.title: Did you hear that thunk? That was me falling off my chair in shock
item.description: OK, a bit tired on a Monday morning, and so a bit sarcastic. I’ve not really fallen off my chair, but I am shocked. I honestly didn’t think it would happen. Oracle have finally released OBI 11g for HP-UX Itanium: In other news, patchset 10.1.3.4.2 for OBI 10g was released today, I wonder if/when we’ll get an HP-UX Itanium version? The download page has it conspicuous by its absence even from “Coming Soon”:
